Community groups in the areas served by The Authority have the opportunity to promote non-profit, community events and services through PATV18's Community Bulletin Boards.

The Authority staff updates some of the Community Bulletin Boards; others are maintained by municipal employees in areas where equipment was donated to towns and cities.

 

This is a service to local communities. As a general rule, an announcement will have a higher priority in the town in which the event or service occurs. We may need to edit an announcement's information to fit the space on our equipment's pages.

 

For more information, contact the office listed below for your town, or e-mail Rhode Island PEG Access Director. If there is a link to one of our studios, you may use it to e-mail your message to that site.
